content: pussyhat in the round for 4 gauges  dk 5 5 sts/inch on us 6 200 yards  worsted 4 5 sts/inch on us 8 150 yards  bulky 3 5 sts/inch on us 10 5 115 yards  superbulky 2 25 sts/inch on us 15 50 yards cast on 116 100 76 48 sts place marker and join in the round being careful not to twist work in k2 p2 ribbing for 4 25 change to stockinette stitch k every row and work until piece measures 8 from cast on edge bind off all sts and seam or better yet turn work inside out and bind off using the 3-needle bind off technique weave in ends and rawr knotanotherhat com
